posts.post_content:
Dolly Gray - $225
Jimmy Williams - SOLD
Nap Lajoie (Throwing) - $299
Kaiser Wilhelm (Batting) - $55
Rube Manning - SOLD
Lefty Leifield (Pitching) - $39

Prices include insured shipping and tracking.

Hi Chris, I emailed you through the site, but sometimes they don't go through. I'm interested in the Dolly Gray, but I'd like to get a better look at the card's details. Do you mind taking picture of the card and sending it my way, since you scanner doesn't do well with the BVG holders? [url]trae@t206.org[/url] - I appreciate your time, thank you.
Trae --- Sorry, but I did not get your e-mail.  I'll take some photos of the Dolly Gray and e-mail them to you.  No problem.  Chris
Trae - Close-up photos of the Dolly Gray card sent today in three (3) separate e-mails.   Let me know if you need anything further.  Thanks, Chris
Williams SOLD, the remainder still available.
bump - Have a safe 4th of July weekend!
Updated to reflect latest sale / cards remaining.
